item.title: 3 of the Most Important Charts to Watch Right Now
item.description: Oil prices and interest rates are in a sweet spot, enabling accelerated earnings growth among S&P 500 companies, underpinning the stock price rally.

item.title: Rocket Lab’s Rally Isn’t Random—Big Catalysts Are Ahead
item.description: Rocket Lab is breaking out to new all-time highs, driven by record contract wins, strong sector-wide momentum, and a technically constructive setup.

item.title: Sable Offshore: The Court Ruling That Changes Everything
item.description: A pivotal federal court victory clears the way for Sable Offshore to bypass regulatory hurdles and restart production at its massive California asset.

item.title: Ironwood Pharmaceuticals’ 2026 Guidance Shock Sparks a Major Re-Rating
item.description: Ironwood Pharmaceuticals rose 30% after a strategic price cut on Linzess unlocked higher revenue guidance and surprised Wall Street analysts.
